verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a tense meeting in early March with the special counsel] , [ARG0: President Trump 's lawyers] [V: insisted] [ARG1: he had no obligation to talk with federal investigators probing Russia 's interference in the 2016 presidential campaign] .

In a tense meeting in early March with the special counsel , President Trump 's lawyers insisted [ARG0: he] [V: had] [ARG1: no obligation to talk with federal investigators probing Russia 's interference in the 2016 presidential campaign] .

In a tense meeting in early March with the special counsel , President Trump 's lawyers insisted [ARG0: he] had no obligation to [V: talk] [ARG2: with federal investigators probing Russia 's interference in the 2016 presidential campaign] .

In a tense meeting in early March with the special counsel , President Trump 's lawyers insisted he had no obligation to talk with [ARG0: federal investigators] [V: probing] [ARG1: Russia 's interference in the 2016 presidential campaign] .
